entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oxford House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
